showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Fat Ham,’ James Ijames' fanciful Pulitzer Prize-winning riff on Hamlet that opened tonight at the American Airlines Theatre, takes a sad tale about bloody vengeance and reconfigures it into a joyful celebration of love and a quest for self-determination.”
